heading: rio sings toll-free calling tune
subheading: the rio mp3 playback device can play more than digital music. hackers are circulating instructions for making it emulate the sound of quarters entering old pay phones.
author: wired news report
text: add free phone calls to the rio internet music player's list of undocumented features. availability may vary. hackers are circulating instructions on turning the diamond multimedia mp3 player into a device for making free phone calls.the trick, which has also been used by palmpilot owners, marries an old technique to a digital-era device.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
